price: हाय मेरा विनाश! काश मैंने अमुक व्यक्ति को मित्र न बनाया होता।
arabic: يَٰوَيۡلَتَىٰ لَيۡتَنِي لَمۡ أَتَّخِذۡ فُلَانًا خَلِيلٗا

version.title: Hindi Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indian by Azizul-Haqq Al-Umary.

meta.transliteration: yāwaylatā laytanī lam attakhidh fulānan khalīlan
